name: Wizened Arbiter

rulings.text: In a casual game, a card you choose from outside the game comes from your personal collection. In a tournament event, a card you choose from outside the game must come from your sideboard. You may look at your sideboard at any time.
You don’t have to reveal the card in your hand that’s leaving the game.
If you have no cards in hand, you can’t put the white card you reveal into your hand.

text: When Wizened Arbiter enters the battlefield, you may reveal a white card you own from outside the game. If you do, exchange that card with a card in your hand.
